Package doerfer

Class AdvancedTile

java.lang.Object
doerfer.preset.Tile
doerfer.AdvancedTile
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvancedTilePlaced, DummyTile
public class AdvancedTile extends doerfer.preset.Tile
Class AdvancedTile, extends Tile. Saves the player who sets the Tile, the types of biomes at the edges given in a LinkedList[Biome]. Is able to determine which biome is the center from the given biomes
Author:
Jannis Fischer

  • Constructor Details

    • AdvancedTile

      public AdvancedTile(List<doerfer.preset.Biome> ls)
      Constructor. Gets a list of the biomes and calls the the super-constructor. Throws an error, if the given list is null or contains not exact six elements.
      Parameters:
      ls - List of the biomes

  • Method Details

    • getCenter

      public doerfer.preset.Biome getCenter()
      Returns the Biome, which is in the center depending on the given biomes on the edges
      Specified by:
      getCenter in class doerfer.preset.Tile
      Returns:
      Biome (Biome.HOUSES or Biome.FIELDS or etc...)

    • createVisualTile

      public AdvancedDrawableTile createVisualTile(doerfer.preset.graphics.GPanel p) throws IOException
      Returns a AdvancedDrawableTile with center and edges of the current tile. All six edges and the center are added to a new DrawableTile
      Parameters:
      p - GPanel which is used
      Returns:
      DrawableTile
      Throws:
      IOException - from addChild

    • BiomeToPresetTileComponentEdge

      public doerfer.preset.graphics.PresetTileComponent BiomeToPresetTileComponentEdge(doerfer.preset.Biome b)
      Returns for a given biome the corresponding PresentTileComponent on the edge
      Parameters:
      b - Biome for which the PresentTileComponent should be returned
      Returns:
      PresentTileComponent of an edge of a biome

    • getVisualTile

      public AdvancedDrawableTile getVisualTile(doerfer.preset.graphics.GPanel p) throws IOException
      Returns the visual Tile of the AdvancedTile. If this doesn't exists, a new one is created with createVisualTile()
      Parameters:
      p - the panel, where something should be shown
      Returns:
      AdvancedDrawableTile of the AdvancedTile
      Throws:
      IOException - from addChild
